### Get to know a little about me

:::{#alma}


My name is Dillon Sparks and I am an aspiring data scientist with a focus in using data to promote educational equity. This website is comprised of my academic accomplishments, professional endeavors, and hobbies/interests. I carefully curated this space (using Quarto and R Markdown) to give prospective employers and friends a peek into different areas of my life.
